auto.info:
FARES W.E.F - 15/10/2013

Fare:
Rs 18/- for first 1.5 Kilometer and thereafter Rs. 12.31/- per Kilometer for every additional Kilometer.

Night Charges:
25% of the fare (12:00 AM to 5:00 AM)

Luggage:
Rs. 3/- shall be charged as extra luggage on every package of size greater tha 60*40 cm charges, whereas the driver/ operator shall not charge and money for a shopping bag or a small suitcase

For Compalinets call Toll Free No. 18002330012. Please mention Vehicle no., Vehicle Type, Driver's Billa no., Place, Date , Time
